00056         public function GetSiteByIdSite ( $idSite )
00057         {
00058                 if ( isset ( $this->sites [ $idSite ] ) )
00059                 {
00060                         return $this->sites [ $idSite ];
00061                 }
00062                 else
00063                 {
00064                         $errors = new Errors ( );
00065                         $errors->Add ( new SiteError ( SiteError::SITE_NOT_LOADED, 'Site not loaded from database or not existant.' ) );
00066                         
00067                         return $errors;
00068                 }
00069         } //---- End of GetSiteByIdSite
00070         
00085         public function GetSiteByName ( $nameSite )
00086         {
00087                 foreach ( $this->sites as $site ) 
00088                 {
00089                         if ( $site->GetProperty ( TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME ) == $nameSite )
00090                         {
00091                                 return $site;
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094                 
00095                 $errors = new Errors ( );
00096                 $errors->Add ( new SiteError ( SiteError::SITE_NOT_LOADED, 'Site not loaded from database or not existant.' ) );
00097                         
00098                 return $errors;
00099         } //---- End of GetSiteByName
00100         
00108         public function SetSite ( Site $site )
00109         {
00110                 $this->Add ( $site );
00111         } //---- End of SetSite
00112

00114 
00122     public function Add( Site $item )
00123     {
00124                 $key = $item->GetProperty ( TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE );
00125         
00126                 if ( empty ( $key ) )
00127                 {
00128                         $this->sites [] = $item;                
00129                 }
00130                 else
00131                 {
00132                         $this->sites [ $key ] = $item;
00133                 }
00134     } //---- End of Add
00135 
00140     public function DelAll( )
00141     {
00142         unset($this->sites);
00143         
00144         $this->sites = array();
00145     } //---- End of DelAll
00146 
00153     public function GetCount( )
00154     {
00155         return count( $this->sites );
00156     } //---- End of GetCount
00157

00163     public function Rewind( )
00164     {
00165         reset( $this->sites );
00166     } //--- End of Rewind
00167 
00174     public function Current( )
00175     {
00176         return current( $this->sites );

00209     {
00210         return $this->current( ) !== false;
00211     } //---- End of Valid
